alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Northern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 2:59AM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Montana Hi-Line adjacent to the Rocky Mountain Front, Eastern Toole and Liberty, and Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick or snow covered road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to less than one half mile at times. Snow drifting onto the roadway could also make roads difficult to navigate in spots.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Northern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
